text: Nza Firipaira kim, mba vhuui fhuv viktuma pi tugi bakɨvi vhɨzgim, nza vui. Nza Firipai tha vuav kim, fethɨgi rari vhɨzgim, nza meeŋthɨgi ran, nza vov Troasan kav, nzan rargi gumgi, nza mben hɨgi. Nza Troasan mben hɨgap, harathɨgi rarir nza Troasan kegi. 20.6 Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ kaŋgiap nta kheri gumgi vhɨrve, mbe kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, Por taagia Firipain zɨgap, ana Rukar kov vugi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, kha kameŋ wom khaŋ hɨgi. Mba kameŋ khare. Nza ndu FG 16.10 ganɨri.
